about_the_game:
It's the soundtrack of First Strike, in "320kbps MP3's" format. Six tracks in a beautiful 12 minutes EP soundscape.

If you like the music of First Strike, please consider getting the OST to and directly support Michel Barengo for his fantastic work on this custom soundtrack.

Please note: once purchased, the bonus content will appear in the game's root installation directory.

name: First Strike - OST
